title: United States economy similarity between periods

content.question: Which of the following explains a similarity between the United States economy in the early 1900s depicted in the excerpt and the United States economy in the first half of the 1800s?

choices.label: In both periods the federal government owned and operated new transportation infrastructure.
In both periods, new technology increasingly connected Americans to commerce and markets.
In both periods, a new political movement called for increased regulation of businesses.
In both periods, overseas colonies provided new markets for United States manufacturers.

content.answer: In both periods, new technology increasingly connected Americans to commerce and markets.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
